title: the Minister for Justice conferred on her by or under the enactments specified in
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Justice (Delegation of Ministerial
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Justice (Delegation of Ministerial 

Functions) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited justice (delegation ministerial functions) order 2020

title: the Minister for Justice conferred on her by or under the enactments specified in
heading: 2. The powers (other than the power to prosecute an offence) and duties of
text_raw:
2. The powers (other than the power to prosecute an offence) and duties of 
the Minister for Justice conferred on her by or under the enactments specified in 
the Schedule are delegated to James Browne, Minister of State at the Department 
of Justice. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 6th November, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [504] 3
text_norm: 2 power (other power prosecute offence) duty minister justice conferred enactment specified schedule delegated james browne minister state department justice notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 6th november 2020 504 3

title: the Minister for Justice conferred on her by or under the enactments specified in
heading: Betting Acts 1931 to 2015
text_raw:
SCHEDULE 

Betting Acts 1931 to 2015 

Firearms Acts 1925 to 2009 

Part Ill of the Firearms and Offensive Weapons Act 1990 (No. 12 of 1990) 

Gaming and Lotteries Acts 1956 to 2019 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

3 November, 2020. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [504]
